actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to extend the boundaries of White Sands Missile Range, White Sands, New Mexico, and to provide an exchange of federal lands for state lands.

summary.text: Permits the State of New Mexico to exchange with the United States specified lands owned by the State within the boundaries of White Sands Missile Range for other surveyed, unreserved, and unappropriated public lands or interests in such lands within the State.

titles.title: A bill to extend the boundaries of White Sands Missile Range, White Sands, New Mexico, and to provide an exchange of federal lands for state lands.
